post.body: Hello -real Pamela! good luck back at school on Monday. See you on Tuesday at NHSTE.
Hope you are having fun. I'm at server. Server going down soon for battery changes.Need to chat with you soon re intern solo wk.
I've gotten a couple DM's like that today also. From 2 different folks. What is this?
http://worldwidelighthouses.wikispaces.com/
Bye, bye Andrew. Have a safe trip back to school.
Who really wanted to watch Bugs Bunny? Tell the truth. Happy Vacation and Happy New Year.
Let's hope for the best of flying weather .
Looking forward to meeting you at educon.
Happy New Year, Andrew. Have a second half of the year back at school.
Oh my! You are just a mere baby. Happy New Year to you.
Happy New Year Jeff. i've got to wait for 56 more minutes.
Me thinks you must be getting lots of snow!
Adam says there is good info when you google - iphone,3G,cracked screen.
My son dropped hs iPhone tday getting out of hs truck.Screen smashed but phone works.He's buying screen on ebay&fixing it himself.
Happy New Year to you! May you have a great 2009!
Woo Hoo - You'll be seeing 2009 before me. Have a wonderful time.
What is wrong with that picture? Enjoy vacation - will I see you at DCS next week?
I'll send some your way - ready in 10 minutes.
Off to make some dinner. It's been such a lazy day for me.4 more vacation days. Are they still vacation if 2 of them are working at school?
Lighthouses around the world wiki for 2nd gr. students of @mrichme . please add photos. thanks. http://worldwidelighthouses.wikispaces.com/
